about_the_game:
Exodus: Creepy Time" is an exciting casual style game with elements of a simplified roguelike. An ominous journey through dark and gloomy locations awaits you, where every action you take has serious consequences. Survive in a world where darkness and horror lurk at every turn. Collect resources, upgrade your character and develop new skills to survive in this horror world.

Trapped in a world steeped in darkness and horror, where sinister forces rule every corner. The main character discovers that the world he is in has turned out to be cursed. People and animals have turned into mutants and monsters under the influence of dark forces. He is left alone with this horror, and his only goal is to find a way out of this nightmarish reality, but keep in mind time is inexorably ticking, and the curse is getting stronger by the hour. Will the hero be able to find the strength and wisdom to overcome the horrors of this "Creepy Time" and free himself from this dark web?

- Simple and Addictive Gameplay

- Improvements and New Skills

short_description: Join the battle in the dark world of the Middle Ages, shrouded in evil and magic, as brave knights, each of whom fights to save their native lands from mystical threats. "Exodus: Creepy Time" is an exciting shoot 'em up with a top view, combining elements of roguelike and arcade games.
